#labels Phase-Requirements
=Action Executor=
AAU, I want to pass the result of the action to the next one.

AAU, I want to save out the execution result for the further analysis.

=Monitor=
AAU, I want the monitor supports the timer event.

AAU, I want the monitor supports the network event.

AAU, I want the monitor is live all the time, so that it doesn't miss any event.

AAU, I want the monitor consumes the CPU and memory as little as possible.

AAU, I want to set the event to be monitored to the monitor, and specify an action for this event.

AAU, I want the monitor execute the specified action when the enent is fired.
